sentences.en: A business needs insurance against risks such as fire and flood.
sentences.cn: 公司需要上保险以防备火灾、洪灾等风险。

sentences.en: As the snows melt, the flood waters rise.
sentences.cn: 雪融化的时候，洪水会上涨。

sentences.en: Flood waters washed away one of the main bridges in Pusan.
sentences.cn: 洪水冲垮了釜山的一座主要桥梁。

sentences.en: He received a flood of letters from irate constituents.
sentences.cn: 他收到愤怒的选区居民洪水般涌来的信件。

sentences.en: Infectious diseases are spreading among many of the flood victims.
sentences.cn: 传染病正在遭受洪灾的很多灾民中蔓延。

sentences.en: It is said that there has been a big flood.
sentences.cn: 据说,那里遭受了一场大洪水的袭击.

sentences.en: Local officials say the flood waters have subsided.
sentences.cn: 当地官员称洪水已经退去了。

sentences.en: The discovery of gold brought a flood of prospectors into the Territories.
sentences.cn: 金子的发现吸引了大量的勘探者进入这些地区。

sentences.en: The flood of cars has now slowed to a trickle.
sentences.cn: 汹涌的车流现在已经变得稀稀拉拉。

sentences.en: The houses down by the river flood quite regularly.
sentences.cn: 沿河的房屋常遭水淹。

sentences.en: The reason for the flood was that heavy rain.
sentences.cn: 水灾是那场大雨造成的.

sentences.en: The sight of him entering a room could flood her with desire.
sentences.cn: 见到他进入房间会让她心中欲望澎湃。

sentences.en: The torrential rain may flood the low - lying land out.
sentences.cn: 这场骤雨有可能把低洼地淹没.

sentences.en: The village was cut off by floods.
sentences.cn: 那个村子因洪水而与外界中断了联系。

sentences.en: the worst floods for over fifty years
sentences.cn: 五十多年来最严重的水灾

sentences.en: There are now fears that the river could flood.
sentences.cn: 现在人们担心河水会泛滥。

sentences.en: There followed a great flood of indignation in the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 随后,报纸连篇累牍地刊载了表示义愤的文章.

sentences.en: They said goodbye in a flood of tears.
sentences.cn: 他们痛哭流涕地道别。

sentences.en: This is the type of flood dreaded by cavers.
sentences.cn: 这正是洞穴探险者害怕的那种洪水。

sentences.en: Towns and cities all over the country have been flooded.
sentences.cn: 全国各地的城镇都被淹没了。
